Well I don't know much about anything, but I sure liked this film. In short, it was creative, humorous, simple, and heartwarming.
I could tell that the people working behind the scenes really cared about their film. They may not have been millions of dollars rich or famous as big studio directors are but they really cared about their work. You can tell every frame of this movie is seen through a lens with love and care from start to finish.
